name: fun-helpers
description: JavaScript library providing some functional helpers, all very Promise-friendly

scripts.build: browserify index.js -s Fun > dist/fun-helpers.js && browserify index.js -d -s Fun > dist/fun-helpers.debug.js && uglifyjs dist/fun-helpers.js -c > dist/fun-helpers.min.js

author: Nicolas Chambrier <naholyr@gmail.com>
